title: Attention UWS LoL Players!
body:
Hi everyone,

Unfortunately we couldn't get a team together because we only found 4 Plat+ elo players who go to UWS. Please search on FB for UWS GG and you might be able to find the gaming group we have at UWS that has a large number of league players in it. Alternatively, add Mageofpie in game. 

Maybe they'll let us join if we can organise something quick
